title: Atomic Wallet Reportedly Hacked: $35M in Crypto Assets Vanish
description: Atomic Wallet, a popular cryptocurrency wallet, has reportedly been hit by a major security breach, resulting in over $35 million in digital assets being stolen. This alarming news was reported by BleepingComputer on June 4, 2023. Atomic Wallet, a versatile crypto wallet compatible with various operating systems, including Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, and Linux, is [â€¦]

title: Revolutionizing Aid Delivery: Stellar Blockchain Empowers Instant, Transparent, and Borderless Cash Assistance
description:
The Stellar blockchain is revolutionizing the aid assistance process with borderless, low-cost, transparent, and near-instant settlements. Blockchain disbursements of cash assistance are yet another way the new technology expands financial access and improves lives. In the latest report from the Stellar Development Foundation (SDF), the non-profit organization supporting the development of Stellar highlighted how the [...]
